snippet.title: Flux
snippet.description:
Flux is a game made by Masterwork Software in 1999, back then my parents brought me a CD with lots of demos including Gubble, which i loved too. I remember i could spend hours playing flux because it was really fun, and it looked pretty awesome, i still think it does, and man, the music. The funniest thing is that FluxLE (The demo version) only had 3 tracks, but they were all pretty cool. I uploaded this video because i'm sure i'm not the only one who played this gem of a pc game, and i wanna make sure no one forgets about it. You can download the demo version at www.planetflux.com

Note: I didn't use FRAPS because this game is too old, that should explain the FPS drops and stuff.

Enjoy.

UPDATE: Here's a download url for the Full version and it should work on Win7.


https://www.dropbox.com/sh/q9uia3qnlhqc4l4/AAADHODbPp4cNRHjYjbhP8Ada/Flux.exe?dl=0﻿

Credits to Mateus Couto
